baseRule.text: 若復苾芻足食竟。不作餘食法更食者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 34

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhuttāvī pavārito anatirittaṁ khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 35

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer Speise genossen hat, und (weitere Speiseangebote) abgelehnt hat und (dann doch) eßbare oder genießbare Speise, die nicht übrig gelassen wurde, ißt oder genießt, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk has finished his meal and refused an invitation to eat more, and then eats fresh or cooked food that is not left over, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu, habiendo comido y reusado un ofrecimiento [de más comida], que no sean sobrantes, ingiere o consume un ingerible o un consumible: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。食竟不受殘食法。若食。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 34

fullParallels.text: 若比丘不受殘食法。更食者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 34

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。食竟不作殘食法。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 35

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。食已足離坐處。不作殘食法。食者波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 33

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！足食竟，或時受請，不作餘食法而食者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 35

translations.text: If a monk, after a sufficient meal, at a time per chance when he has received an invitation to dine, do not comply with the rules which refer to superfluous food, but take an additional meal elsewhere, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu yang telah selesai makan akan menerima undangan dan makan lebih banyak makanan yang bukan sisa, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.
